>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Hj7rGHmzQGP8rEGB]{Empath}

As a full action, you can attempt a Sense Motive check to read the emotions of a particular creature (DC = 20 or 10 + its Bluff modifier, whichever is higher). If you succeed, you learn its general disposition and attitude toward creatures within 30 feet of it, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, and Sense Motive checks against that creature for 1 hour. Whether you succeed or fail, after opening your mind to read emotions, you take a â€“2 penalty to saving throws against mind-affecting effects for 1 minute.
